items.creator: John Piper
items.title: The Marvel of Creation
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: When you marvel at the wonders of creation, do not marvel at the processes of chance but at the creativity of God.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Do Not Harden Your Heart
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: The Bible’s warnings are written that you might believe and endure, and have life.
items.contentSnippet: The Bible’s warnings are written that you might believe and endure, and have life.

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.subtitle: The Bible’s warnings are written that you might believe and endure, and have life.
itunes.summary: The Bible’s warnings are written that you might believe and endure, and have life.
itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, Repentance, Hebrews 3:19

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: How Satan Serves God
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: Satan cannot destroy us. In fact, God turns all his attacks finally against him and for us.
items.contentSnippet: Satan cannot destroy us. In fact, God turns all his attacks finally against him and for us.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: We Are His House
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: Becoming a Christian and being a Christian happen in the same way: by hoping in Jesus.
items.contentSnippet: Becoming a Christian and being a Christian happen in the same way: by hoping in Jesus.

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.subtitle: Becoming a Christian and being a Christian happen in the same way: by hoping in Jesus.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Wipe Your Fears Away
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: When anxiety blurs our vision of God’s glory, it does not mean that we are faithless. It means our faith is being attacked.
items.contentSnippet: When anxiety blurs our vision of God’s glory, it does not mean that we are faithless. It means our faith is being attacked.

itunes.subtitle: When anxiety blurs our vision of God’s glory, it does not mean that we are faithless. It means our faith is being attacked.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Marveling at the End of History
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: One day, we will see God’s glory, and marvel at it in such a way that he will be glorified in us for all the world to see.
items.contentSnippet: One day, we will see God’s glory, and marvel at it in such a way that he will be glorified in us for all the world to see.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: We Honor What We Enjoy
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: It is possible to pursue God without glorifying God. If we want our quest to honor God, we must pursue him for the joy of fellowship with him.
items.contentSnippet: It is possible to pursue God without glorifying God. If we want our quest to honor God, we must pursue him for the joy of fellowship with him.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Is God’s Love Conditional?
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: There are precious experiences of the love of God that require that we fight pride, seek humility, and cherish the nearness of God.
items.contentSnippet: There are precious experiences of the love of God that require that we fight pride, seek humility, and cherish the nearness of God.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Love One Another Gladly
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: Loving acts are genuine to the degree that they are not done begrudgingly.
items.contentSnippet: Loving acts are genuine to the degree that they are not done begrudgingly.

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.subtitle: Loving acts are genuine to the degree that they are not done begrudgingly.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Do You Neglect Your Salvation?
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: Being a Christian is a very serious business, though not a sour business. We are simply blood-earnest about being happy in our great salvation.
items.contentSnippet: Being a Christian is a very serious business, though not a sour business. We are simply blood-earnest about being happy in our great salvation.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: The Real Problem with Anxiety
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: What you thought was a mere struggle with an anxious disposition might really be a far deeper struggle with trusting God.
items.contentSnippet: What you thought was a mere struggle with an anxious disposition might really be a far deeper struggle with trusting God.

itunes.subtitle: What you thought was a mere struggle with an anxious disposition might really be a far deeper struggle with trusting God.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: The Meaning of Suffering
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: It is truer in suffering than anywhere else that God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in him.
items.contentSnippet: It is truer in suffering than anywhere else that God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in him.

itunes.subtitle: It is truer in suffering than anywhere else that God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in him.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Rejoicing in Pain
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: Whether we focus on the riches of the reward or the refining effects of suffering, God’s purpose is that our joy in suffering be sustained.
items.contentSnippet: Whether we focus on the riches of the reward or the refining effects of suffering, God’s purpose is that our joy in suffering be sustained.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Christ’s Sufferings in Us
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: We exhibit the sufferings of Christ when we ourselves suffer for those we are trying to win.
items.contentSnippet: We exhibit the sufferings of Christ when we ourselves suffer for those we are trying to win.

itunes.subtitle: We exhibit the sufferings of Christ when we ourselves suffer for those we are trying to win.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: The Seminary of Suffering
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: God designs suffering not only as a way to wean Christians off of self and onto grace, but also as a way to spotlight that grace and make it shine.
items.contentSnippet: God designs suffering not only as a way to wean Christians off of self and onto grace, but also as a way to spotlight that grace and make it shine.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: The Danger of Drifting
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: Be satisfied in Jesus so that you do not get lured downstream by deceitful desires.
items.contentSnippet: Be satisfied in Jesus so that you do not get lured downstream by deceitful desires.

itunes.subtitle: Be satisfied in Jesus so that you do not get lured downstream by deceitful desires.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Sin, Satan, Sickness, or Sabotage
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: Suffering proves our allegiance to Christ’s goodness and reveals his worth as an all-sufficient prize.
items.contentSnippet: Suffering proves our allegiance to Christ’s goodness and reveals his worth as an all-sufficient prize.

itunes.subtitle: Suffering proves our allegiance to Christ’s goodness and reveals his worth as an all-sufficient prize.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Radical Recompense
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: Jesus himself makes up for every sacrifice he will ever call us to make. It is worth it to lose it all in order to gain Christ.
items.contentSnippet: Jesus himself makes up for every sacrifice he will ever call us to make. It is worth it to lose it all in order to gain Christ.

itunes.subtitle: Jesus himself makes up for every sacrifice he will ever call us to make. It is worth it to lose it all in order to gain Christ.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Possible with God
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: God has a people in every people group. He will call them through the gospel with Creator power. And they will believe!
items.contentSnippet: God has a people in every people group. He will call them through the gospel with Creator power. And they will believe!

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.subtitle: God has a people in every people group. He will call them through the gospel with Creator power. And they will believe!

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Medicine for the Missionary
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: “All things are possible with God!” — in front the words give hope, and behind they give humility. They are the antidote to both despair and pride.
items.contentSnippet: “All things are possible with God!” — in front the words give hope, and behind they give humility. They are the antidote to both despair and pride.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: The Great Missionary Hope
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: God’s call is irresistible in the sense that it can overcome all resistance. It is infallibly effective according to God’s purpose.
items.contentSnippet: God’s call is irresistible in the sense that it can overcome all resistance. It is infallibly effective according to God’s purpose.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Christ Is Like Sunlight
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: We see the sun by means of seeing the rays of the sun. So also we see God the Father by seeing Jesus.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: God’s Final, Decisive Word
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: The Word that God spoke by his Son is the decisive Word. It will not be followed in this age by any greater word or replacement word.
items.contentSnippet: The Word that God spoke by his Son is the decisive Word. It will not be followed in this age by any greater word or replacement word.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Hedonism for Husbands and Wives
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: When Christ redeems marriage, he does not dismantle loving headship and willing submission. He restores it.
items.contentSnippet: When Christ redeems marriage, he does not dismantle loving headship and willing submission. He restores it.

itunes.subtitle: When Christ redeems marriage, he does not dismantle loving headship and willing submission. He restores it.

items.title: The Mystery of Marriage
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: Husbands and wives should seek to live after the distinctive model of God’s pure and glad design for Christ and the church.
items.contentSnippet: Husbands and wives should seek to live after the distinctive model of God’s pure and glad design for Christ and the church.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Prayer’s First Priority
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: The first priority in praying is to ask our heavenly Father to cause his name to be hallowed. In us. In the church. In the world. Everywhere.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Love’s Greatest Happiness
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: The union between Christ and his bride is so close that any good done to her is a good done to himself.
items.contentSnippet: The union between Christ and his bride is so close that any good done to her is a good done to himself.

itunes.subtitle: The union between Christ and his bride is so close that any good done to her is a good done to himself.

items.title: Jesus’s Joy in Marriage
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: Jesus did not want a dirty and unholy wife. Therefore, he was willing to die to cleanse her so that he could present her to himself.
items.contentSnippet: Jesus did not want a dirty and unholy wife. Therefore, he was willing to die to cleanse her so that he could present her to himself.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: The Purpose of Prosperity
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: You can steal to get; or you can work to get; or you can work to get in order to give.
items.contentSnippet: You can steal to get; or you can work to get; or you can work to get in order to give.

items.title: Fear and Hope in God’s Jealousy

items.content: It is a horrifying thing to use your God-given life to commit adultery against the Almighty.

items.title: Plan for Prayer

items.content: One of the main reasons we so often fail to have consistent habits of happy, fruitful prayer is simply that we don’t plan to.

items.title: God Heals by Humbling

items.content: God takes out our old proud hearts and gives new soft ones, which are easily humbled and crushed by the sin that remains.

items.content: God is glorified when we turn away from ourselves to him in the confidence that he will provide the help we need.

items.content: The greatest news is that the cross upholds the worth of God’s glory, the honor of his Son, and the eternal salvation of his elect.

items.title: God’s Wise Mercy
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: The good news is that God himself has decreed a way to satisfy the demands of his justice without condemning the whole human race.

items.title: Our Good Is God’s Delight

items.content: All the omnipotent energy that drives the heart of God to pursue his own glory also drives him to satisfy the hearts of those who seek their joy in him.

items.title: We Wait, He Works

items.content: Be freed from the burden of bearing your own load. Let God do that work. God loves to show his God-ness by working for us.

items.content: When we share in the happiness of God, we share in the very pleasure that the Father has in the Son.

itunes.subtitle: When we share in the happiness of God, we share in the very pleasure that the Father has in the Son.

itunes.keywords: Desiring God, John Piper, Article, The Glory of God, 1 Timothy 1:10–11

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Justice Will Be Done
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: When you lay down the burden of vengeance, God will pick it up.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Joy Unbound
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: Imagine being able to enjoy what is most enjoyable with unbounded energy and passion forever. One day, God’s delight in his Son will be in us.
items.contentSnippet: Imagine being able to enjoy what is most enjoyable with unbounded energy and passion forever. One day, God’s delight in his Son will be in us.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Absolute, Sovereign, Almighty Love
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: God does not need us. Instead, his infinite self-sufficiency spills over in love to us who need him.
items.contentSnippet: God does not need us. Instead, his infinite self-sufficiency spills over in love to us who need him.

itunes.author: John Piper
itunes.subtitle: God does not need us. Instead, his infinite self-sufficiency spills over in love to us who need him.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: God Isn’t Gloomy
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: If none of God’s purposes can be frustrated, then he must be the happiest of all beings.
items.contentSnippet: If none of God’s purposes can be frustrated, then he must be the happiest of all beings.

items.title: The All-Satisfying Object
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: The quest for joy is not optional, but commanded.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: The Most Liberating Discovery
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: Joy is not a mere option alongside worship. It is an essential component of worship.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Make War with Unbelief
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: Take up the Bible, ask the Holy Spirit for help, lay the promises up in your heart, and fight the good fight — to live by faith in future grace.
items.contentSnippet: Take up the Bible, ask the Holy Spirit for help, lay the promises up in your heart, and fight the good fight — to live by faith in future grace.

items.creator: John Piper
items.title: Our Good Is His Glory
items.dc:creator: John Piper
items.content: God’s greatest interest is to glorify the wealth of his grace by making sinners happy in him.

title: Solid Joys Daily Devotional
description: Solid Joys is a daily devotional written and read by John Piper. These short and substantive readings will feed your joy in Jesus every day of the year. Discover more from Piper at desiringGod.org.
